item.title: Pia Robbins - I've Been Working On the Railroad - Key of C
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C. Generally the C, F, and G7 chords with a single use of the Hawaiian D7 and E7 in each verse (Skip them if you need to)
As performed by Pia Robbins
Original video: https://youtu.be/_q0-b9hgFMs
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com. The colored font matches Aquila KIDS ukulele strings.
